name: The Kitty In The Pumpkin
description:
"You´re ready to carve some pumpkins, but your kitty won't let you, cause it wanna play!"

A simple Where Is The Ball game but with a kitty and pumpkins.

This is my first Jam on Itch.io and english is not my first language so please excuse any mistakes.

Andressa Alves\Andy Scarlet -  Game Designer - Art and 2d Animation 

Eliel Rangel - Programmer
